body.name: Reach Essentials Toothbrush with Toothbrush Caps, Multi-Zoned Angled Soft Bristles, Contoured Handle, Tongue Scraper, 6 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 52 mins
features: 6 Count Value Pack: Every REACH toothbrush offers high quality oral care for the entire family, with a wide array of toothbrushes that can get even the messiest mouth clean
Soft Bristles: Toothbrush contains bi-level bristles that clean in between teeth and remove plaque from the gum line for everyday effective cleaning
Ergonomic Contoured Handle: Angled neck and bristles, together with our trademark REACH Tip design help to effectively clean those hard-to-reach places in your mouth

Additional Features: Each toothbrush has a built-in tongue scraper that aids in removing bad breath and odor-causing bacteria, package also includes a brush cover with ventilation holes to protect and keep brush head clean for storage and travel

Toothbrush Innovation: REACH has a proven history of innovation and performance with a purpose, creating the first toothbrush with an angled neck design to make it easier to clean hard-to-reach places
body.description: REACH Essentials Toothbrushes effectively clean the hard-to-reach places in the back of your mouth. Apart from removing plaque deep between the teeth and along the gum line, this toothbrush’s angled neck and soft bristles allow for a more comprehensive clean. On the back is a tongue scraper to eliminate bad breath causing bacteria. This toothbrush also comes with a contoured handle made of soft rubber and plastic for a comfortable cushion grip. Includes 6 toothbrushes with toothbrush caps to protect the bristles. Great for the entire family, these brushes will consistently help maintain oral hygiene daily. Don't just brush, REACH!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not too hard or soft. Toothbursh is sturdy and works well. Price was great for the amount of brushes you get.. 6 and comes with 5 cap coverings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Brushing Experience that Pops with Color and Comfort!
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the REACH Essentials Toothbrush with Toothbrush Caps from Amazon, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Let me share how these toothbrushes brighten up my oral care routine with their lovely colors and comfortable bristles!The first thing that caught my attention was the vibrant range of colors these toothbrushes come in. It's like a burst of cheerfulness every time I open my oral care cabinet. The colorful options add a fun and playful element to my brushing routine, making it something I look forward to every day.But it's not just the colors that make these toothbrushes a winner. The bristles are incredibly comfortable on my teeth and gums. They provide a gentle yet effective clean, ensuring my oral health is in top shape. It's like treating my mouth to a spa-like experience!I appreciate the thoughtfulness of including toothbrush caps with these brushes. They provide a hygienic and convenient way to protect the bristles, especially when traveling or storing the toothbrushes. It's a small detail that goes a long way in maintaining oral hygiene on the go.The quality of these toothbrushes is excellent. They are well-made, sturdy, and designed to last. The bristles maintain their shape and effectiveness even after multiple uses, ensuring a consistently comfortable brushing experience.In terms of value for money, these toothbrushes are a steal. They offer exceptional quality, comfort, and style at an affordable price point. It's an investment in oral health that brings a touch of joy to my daily routine.In conclusion, if you're looking for toothbrushes that not only brighten up your oral care routine with lovely colors but also provide a comfortable brushing experience, look no further. The REACH Essentials Toothbrush with Toothbrush Caps is a delightful addition to any oral care routine. Embrace the joy of brushing with these vibrant and comfortable toothbrushes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I change my soft toothbrushes frequently since on blood thinners and these are such a great price for 6 brushes that several have a case for the head. Even though soft I find these are not flimsy and do a great job. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not soft at all, but great for cleaning faucet!
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly low price, but these brushes were not soft, but the Reach brushes are great for cleaning faucet in bathroom and such! Also it has some plasticized material on part of it, maybe will be banned in 10 years like BPA was.Luckily I bought a lesser-known brand that was truly soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the grandkids visits
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase. They're so nice. I have a bunch of grandchildren and someone always forgets their toothbrush. These are great with the little caps. They're nice to put in the suitcase or backpack when you travel. At this point in time they're

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This are super great for the price and super great quality too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: High quality toothbrush that is soft, comfortable to hold and great for traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought them as travel toothbrushes, but bought more
reviews.reviewText: We bought these for a trip rather than take our electric toothbrushes, but our teen loves them, and we have houseguests often, so we bought more. They are a good deal on Amazon. The bristles are soft and easy to hold. The covers are handy for travel.

Toothbrushes are great if travelling however, green toothbrush is missing the cap.Seems to be a common theme.Not sure if this was intended but if so then suggest manufacturer clearly labels packaging with qty of both toothbrushes and caps.

reviews.reviewTitle: They are supposed to be soft, but they are firm
reviews.reviewText: Great design. They feel good in the hand. However, the brush is to firm. It feels like I'm scrapping parts of my gums everytime I brush my teeth.
